300101.SZ.summary: Chengdu CORPRO Technology Co., Ltd. provides satellite navigation components and terminals. It offers Beidou satellite navigation application key components, integrated circuits, Beidou satellite navigation terminals, and Beidou satellite navigation and positioning application systems, as well as network security monitoring solutions. The company also provides solutions for photography, security, satellite communications, and other fields; indoor positioning systems; and location-based precision digital service platform. Its products are used in national defense, geology, electric power, transportation, public safety, communications, water conservancy, forestry, and other professional applications. The company was formerly known as Chengdu Gotecom Electronical Technology Co., Ltd. and changed its name to Chengdu CORPRO Technology Co., Ltd. in September 2014. Chengdu CORPRO Technology Co., Ltd. was founded in 2003 and is based in Chengdu, China.

300134.SZ.summary: Anhui Tatfook Technology Co.,Ltd provides mobile communication equipment, intelligent terminals, and automobiles in the People's Republic of China and internationally. The company offers as 5G and Internet of Things products, including smart terminals, such as electronics, automobiles, and graphite products; and base station supporting devices, network optimization system devices, and radio frequency products and antennas. It also provides machining, 3D printing, NPL language and design platform, and NPL CAD design services; and education services. The company was formerly known as Shenzhen Tatfook Technology Co., Ltd and changed its name to Anhui Tatfook Technology Co.,Ltd in April 2020. Anhui Tatfook Technology Co.,Ltd was founded in 2001 and is headquartered in Shenzhen, China.

300136.SZ.summary: Shenzhen Sunway Communication Co., Ltd. engages in the research and development, manufacture, marketing, and sale of mobile terminal antennas and related modules, acoustic modules, and connectors. The company offers NFC, AP, BOX, GPS, insert molding, LDS, MIA, stamping, and FPC antennas; and precision metal products, including stamping and MIM products. It also provides connectors, connecting cables and components, and high frequency cables; acoustic products comprising speakers and receivers; soft magnetic materials, including ferrite, metal polymer, amorphous, and nanocrystalline materials; and cables, such as automotive, interconnection, USB type C, RF, and MFI cables, as well as cables for industrial equipment. In addition, the company offers spring contact clips in various shapes. Its products are used in consumer electronics, such as smartphones/tablet PCs, smart wearable devices, smart home/IoT products, and smart automobiles; and military fields. Shenzhen Sunway Communication Co., Ltd. was founded in 2006 and is headquartered in Shenzhen, China.

300167.SZ.summary: Shenzhen Dvision Co.,Ltd. provides smart video and IoT core technology products and solutions in China. The company offers video conferencing and recording, laser display, and face recognition products; private network communication products; and various IoT products. It serves the government, public security, traffic, industrial park, education, and medical sectors. The company was formerly known as Shenzhen Dvision Video Communications Co.,Ltd. and changed its name to Shenzhen Dvision Co.,Ltd. in December 2017. Shenzhen Dvision Co.,Ltd. was founded in 2001 and is based in Shenzhen, China.

300211.SZ.summary: Jiangsu Yitong High-Tech Co., Ltd. engages in the research, development, manufacture, and sale of broadcast cable TV network equipment in China and internationally. The company provides front-end optical transmission equipment, optical workstations, optical transmission platforms, RF-PON products, optical transmitters, optical receivers, optical amplifiers, and other cable TV optical transmission equipment; and digital optical workstations, GEPON, ONU, MoCA, HomePlug and C-DOCSIS, and home gateway series products, as well as CATV coaxial cable transmission equipment, such as trunk amplifiers, passive components, and user terminals. It also offers intelligent monitoring engineering services for social security monitoring and weak electricity intelligent projects. Jiangsu Yitong High-Tech Co., Ltd. was founded in 2001 and is based in Changshu, China.

300213.SZ.long_name: Beijing Jiaxun Feihong Electrical Co., Ltd.
300213.SZ.summary: Beijing Jiaxun Feihong Electrical Co., Ltd. provides dispatching and control systems in China. It offers MDS3400, a dispatch commanding and communication system platform, which integrates voice and data application services; and MDS6800, a visual dispatch and command system. The company also provides IMS8000, a video surveillance system; IMS6000, a railway disaster prevention and safety monitoring solution that includes wind, rain, snow depth, obstacle intrusion, and earthquake monitoring sub-systems; and unmanned planes and robots, as well as emergency communication system. Its products are used in various industries, such as railway, national defense, urban rail transit, petroleum, petrochemical, coal, metallurgy, electric power, finance, and other industries. The company also has operations in Africa, the Middle East, Southeast Asia, and internationally. Beijing Jiaxun Feihong Electrical Co., Ltd. was founded in 1995 and is based in Beijing, China.

300250.SZ.summary: Hangzhou CNCR-IT Co.,Ltd researches, develops, designs, produces, and sells information access equipment in China and internationally. The company provides IPRAN access equipment, including IPRAN terminal devices; RF passive components, such as power splitters, directional and hybrid couplers, coaxial terminations, attenuators, filters, combiners, diplexers, and POI products; and triple play products, such as EOC master and slave products. It also offers enterprise gateway solutions comprising PON and LAN access gateway, and IPPBX; FTTH series products, such as GPON and EPON; and Internet of machine systems. The company serves mobile, unicom, telecom, radio and television, bank and power industries, etc. Hangzhou CNCR-IT Co.,Ltd was founded in 1999 and is based in Hangzhou, China.

300264.SZ.summary: AVIT Ltd. manufactures and sells DVB products and solutions to network operators. It offers DVB solutions, including digital broadcasting, interactive TV, and triple-play solutions; DVB application systems, such as business management and VAS applications; digital head-end products and equipment; digital receivers and embedded software; and value-added software system and terminal products. The company also provides system design, system integration, technical training, and operation consulting services. It serves approximately 70 million subscribers in China and internationally. AVIT Ltd. was founded in 2000 and is based in Shenzhen, China.

300292.SZ.summary: Wutong Holding Group Co., Ltd. engages in the research and development, production, and sale of wireless communication RF connection systems and fiber connection products. The company provides communication connection products for RF and fiber connection fields, as well as mobile communication terminal devices. It offers wireless communication RF connection system products, which primarily include RF coaxial connectors, adaptors, surge arrestors, cables and cable assemblies, and interconnect devices, such as terminal loads, as well as related connection structure parts. The company also provides optic-electric products, including optical splitters, optical fiber patch cords, optical cables, optical fiber connectors, and boxes. In addition, it offers communication antennas. The company was formerly known as Jiangsu Wutong Communications Co.,Ltd. and changed its name to Wutong Holding Group Co., Ltd. in October 2015. Wutong Holding Group Co., Ltd. was founded in 1999 and is based in Suzhou, China.

300310.SZ.summary: Eastone Century Technology Co.,Ltd. provides communication network technology services and system solutions to telecom operators and equipment manufacturers in China. The company offers engineering, construction, maintenance, optimization, and other technical services for communication, wireless, transmission, and other networks; integrated, business support, and IT system solutions; tag analytics big data services; and communications big data business identification services. It also engages in the research and development of communication equipment; and production and sales business. The company was formerly known as Guangdong Eastone Century Technology Co.,Ltd. Eastone Century Technology Co.,Ltd. was founded in 2001 and is based in Guangzhou, China.

300311.SZ.summary: Surfilter Network Technology Co., Ltd. provides network information security solutions in China and internationally. The company offers user entity behavior awareness solution to control and manage Internet usage. It also provides firewall, anti-virus gateway, video surveillance security gateway, intrusion prevention, unknown threat protection gateway, intrusion detection, application delivery, and security isolation and information exchange systems. In addition, the company offers network security situation awareness solutions, Website security monitoring systems, and mobile Internet application security management platforms; operation and maintenance security audit systems; network security audit, log management integrated audit, database auditing, and public area wireless Internet information security management systems; and public opinion security solutions. It serves management companies, network operators, enterprises, public institutions, and individuals. The company was founded in 2000 and is headquartered in Shenzhen, China.

300312.SZ.summary: Boomsense Technology Co.,Ltd. provides wireless broadband access solutions in China. The company provides distributed, dual carrier, enterprise, outdoor, and small cell systems; multiservice distributed access system solutions, repeater series products, micro power distribution systems, and base station amplifiers; and passive devices and point of interfaces. It also offers wireless access point controllers, access points, wireless bridges, and wireless base stations; indoor antennas, base station antennas, camouflage antennas, and camouflage shells; electricity security products; and gateway terminals. Boomsense Technology Co., Ltd. is based in Beijing, China.

300322.SZ.summary: Huizhou Speed Wireless Technology Co.,Ltd. researches, develops, manufactures, sells, and services wireless communication terminal antennas for mobile phone, tablet, wearable device, notebook computer, automobile, drone, security monitoring, and other applications. It offers mobile smart terminal antennas, vehicle-mounted electronic products, wireless charging products, fingerprint and sensor modules, advanced semiconductor-packaging products, precision structural parts, and testing and intelligent detection equipment. The company was founded in 2004 and is headquartered in Huizhou, China.

300330.SZ.long_name: ShangHai Huahong Jitong Smart System Co., Ltd.
300330.SZ.summary: ShangHai Huahong Jitong Smart System Co., Ltd. designs, develops, integrates, produces, sells, and services non-contact IC card machine products in China. The company offers rail transit systems, such as central and station computer systems. It also provides community card systems; bus card systems; and electronic ticketing solutions. In addition, the company offers intelligent supply chain management solutions. ShangHai Huahong Jitong Smart System Co., Ltd. was founded in 1996 and is based in Shanghai, China.

300447.SZ.long_name: Nanjing Quanxin Cable Technology Co., Ltd.
300447.SZ.summary: Nanjing Quanxin Cable Technology Co., Ltd. develops and produces military optoelectronic transmission products. It offers photoelectric transmission and optical cables; photoelectric transmission cable assemblies; optoelectronic devices, such as optical and electrical connectors; and integrated wiring products. The company also provides optoelectronic system integration products, including avionics and control, and ground remote control terminal; and optical transmission systems. Its products are used in the aviation, aerospace, ships, weapons, and electronics fields. The company was founded in 2001 and is headquartered in Nanjing, China.

300454.SZ.summary: Sangfor Technologies Inc. provides IT infrastructure solutions in China and internationally. The company specializes in the provision of cloud computing, and network security and optimization solutions. It offers network security products, including Internet access management products; NGAF firewall platform; and SSL VPN products that provide support for remote user to access the enterprise network. The company also offers SD-WAN optimization solutions, including hardware and virtual software products for the Internet, internal WANs, public and private clouds, and hybrid networks. In addition, it provides virtual desktop infrastructure products; EasyConnect, a remote access solution, which allows the access to Windows desktops and applications; application delivery solutions for service systems; hyper-converged infrastructure solutions; and aBOS, a NFV converged gateway solution. The company serves finance and banking industry, governments, Internet service providers, schools and universities, and enterprises. Sangfor Technologies Inc. was founded in 2000 and is based in Shenzhen, China.

300502.SZ.summary: Eoptolink Technology Inc., Ltd. engages in the research and development, manufacture, and sale of optical transceiver modules and optical components. Its products are used in various ICT applications, such as data center, telecom networks, security monitoring, smart grid, and others. The company operates in approximately 60 countries and regions worldwide. Eoptolink Technology Inc., Ltd. was founded in 2008 and is based in Chengdu, China.

300504.SZ.long_name: Sichuan Tianyi Comheart Telecom Co., Ltd.
300504.SZ.summary: Sichuan Tianyi Comheart Telecom Co., Ltd. researches, develops, produces, sells, and services optical and mobile communication products in China. Its products include physical links and protective devices in communication networks, broadband network terminal equipment, mobile communication network optimizing system equipment, and heat shrinkable products and communication pipes. The company also provides system integration services. Sichuan Tianyi Comheart Telecom Co., Ltd. was founded in 2001 and is based in Chengdu, China.

300531.SZ.summary: Urovo Technology Co., Ltd. manufactures and sells mobile computers and payment terminals in China and internationally. It offers portable printers, scanners, and accessories, as well as provides terminal management software. The company also provides technical support and after sales services. Its products are used in transportation and logistics, warehousing, retail, finance, government enforcement, healthcare, and other sectors. The company was founded in 2006 and is headquartered in Shenzhen, China. Urovo Technology Co., Ltd. is a subsidiary of Urovo Technology (Hong Kong) Holdings Limited.

300555.SZ.summary: Lootom Telcovideo Network (wuxi) Co., Ltd. provides network integrated solutions and services for network operators worldwide. It offers professional network planning and design, network optimization and transformation, network operation and maintenance monitoring, engineering construction, and other services. The company was founded in 2007 and is based in Wuxi, China.

300565.SZ.summary: Shenzhen Kexin Communication Technologies Co.,Ltd engages in the research, development, manufacture, and marketing of telecom communication network equipment in China and internationally. It offers ODN products, including no jumper optical cable cross-connecting cabinets, fiber distribution boxes, optical passive accessories, multi-media boxes, outdoor cabinets, and fiber terminal products; and wireless access products that comprise mini cabinets, fiber terminal boxes, wireless access decoration antennas, RF passive devices, and power distribution products. The company also provides integrated network cabinets consisting of fiber distribution products, traditional optical cable cross-connecting cabinets, and digital distribution frames; main distribution frames; and intelligent ODN products, including intelligent optical distribute frames, intelligent optical cable cross-connecting cabinets, intelligent fiber distribution boxes, intelligent management terminals, intelligent ODN management systems, intelligent patch cords and pigtails, and intelligent optical splitters with pigtails. In addition, it offers solutions in the areas of communication product distribution, integrated communication network, and communication network topology. Further, the company provides application solutions; and offers technical services in the areas of engineering construction, operating, and maintenance. Its products and solutions are used in FTTX, 3G/4G, and transmission networks. The company serves telecom operators, ICT equipment manufacturers, and network integrators. Shenzhen Kexin Communication Technologies Co.,Ltd was founded in 2001 and is based in Shenzhen, China.

300628.SZ.summary: Yealink Network Technology Co., Ltd. provides voice, video, and data unified communication terminal solutions worldwide. The company's product portfolio includes video conferencing systems, conference phones, smart media phones, IP phones, desktop video phones, DECT phones, Skype for business and teams phones, and accessories. It also offers device management platform that provides a set of tools for implementing the company's video and voice communication endpoint devices. The company was founded in 2001 and is based in Xiamen, China.

300638.SZ.summary: Fibocom Wireless Inc. provides wireless communication modules and solutions worldwide. The company offers LPWA, GSM/GPRS, WCDMA/HSPA+, LTE, and SoC modules. It serves Internet of Things and consumer electronic segments. The company was founded in 1999 and is based in Shenzhen, China.

300698.SZ.summary: Wanma Technology Co., Ltd. researches, develops, manufactures, and sells communication electronics and communication connection equipment. Its telecom division products include optical fiber products, outdoor telecom cabinets, copper products, broadband access integrated distribution boxes, equipment cabinets, and transmission equipment use power distribution file cabinets. The company's medical division offers medical devices. Its principal products are used in various areas, such as IDC building, cloud platform, communication network, medical field, national high-speed railway, and railway transportation construction. The company was founded in 1997 and is based in Linan, China.

300710.SZ.long_name: Hangzhou Prevail Optoelectronic Equipment Co., Ltd.
300710.SZ.summary: Hangzhou Prevail Optoelectronic Equipment Co., Ltd. researches, develops, and produces CATV equipment. It offers HFC optical fiber transmission products, such as switches, as well as optical receivers, amplifiers, transmitters, platforms, and optical nodes. The company also provides CATV coaxial cable transmission products comprising bidirectional building and outdoor bi-directional amplifiers, power supplies, and taps and splitters; and digital TV equipment consisting of DVB/IP stream processing devices, encoders, DVB sourcers and adapters, IPTV stream platforms, and other equipment. In addition, it offers EPON and GPON optical network equipment; PTN transmission equipment; industrial Ethernet switches; Ethernet testers; and network management software. The company sells its products in China, Europe, North America, and internationally. Hangzhou Prevail Optoelectronic Equipment Co., Ltd. is based in Hangzhou, China.

300711.SZ.summary: GHT Co., Ltd. engages in the research and development, production, sale, and servicing of ICT-related products in China and internationally. The company offers H20-20 program-controlled exchange, IP switching, railway digital dispatching communication, converged video, network management, and audio recording systems. It offers its solutions to the defense, electric power, railway, and industrial sectors. The company was founded in 1995 and is based in Guangzhou, China.

300762.SZ.summary: Jushri Technologies Inc. engages in the research and development, manufacture, and sale of military broadband mobile communication systems and tactical communication equipment. The company is also involved in the provision of communication technologies, and integrated information solutions for railway and urban rail transit. In addition, it offers electronic welfare system. The company's products are used in various military applications, including base station, relay, terminal, module, and system software. It has 33 patents and 67 software copyrights. The company was founded in 2006 and is based in Shanghai, China.

3047.TW.summary: EDIMAX Technology Co., Ltd. engages in the design, development, manufacture, and marketing of networking solutions to SOHO and SME markets, and businesses in Europe, the United States, Asia, and internationally. It operates through Enterprise, Retail Products and Services; Telecommunication Products and Services; and Others segments. The company's products include whole home Wi-Fi systems, air quality monitoring systems, wireless routers, Wi-Fi range extenders, access points, Wi-Fi bridges, wireless adapters, home automation systems, network cameras, switches, ADSL modem routers, network adapters, print servers, KVM switches, Wi-Fi antennas, and legacy products. Its products also comprise AP controllers, media converters, and SFP/Mini GBICs, as well as accessories; and xDSL routers, Ethernet switches, PoE solutions, powerline solutions, network access controllers, load balancer solutions, network and professional surveillance cameras, VoIP solutions, home entertainment integration solutions, and other customer-oriented networking applications. The company offers its products primarily through retail and online channels, resellers, and distributors. EDIMAX Technology Co., Ltd. was founded in 1986 and is headquartered in Taipei City, Taiwan.

3138.TW.summary: Auden Techno Corp. researches, develops, designs, manufactures, and sells various antennas in Taiwan and internationally. It is also involved in equipment marketing, and test and certification businesses. The company offers CB electronic antennas, mobile phone GSM antennas, and wireless local-area network antennas; ultra-wideband and RFID application antennas; and miniature multi-frequency antenna modules, as well as 4G LTE/MIMO technology and biological electromagnetic wave products. Its products are used in mobile communications, automotive electronics, Internet communications, and digital and industrial applications. In addition, the company provides development, testing, mass production, and after-sales services; and antenna simulation, and design and measurement services. Auden Techno Corp. was founded in 1981 and is based in Taoyuan, Taiwan.

3209.TW.summary: Alltek Technology Corporation operates as a communication components distributor and solution provider in Taiwan and internationally. The company offers broadband access devices used in C/O products, computer devices, servers, modems, and network communication products; wireless communication devices for use in PC, NB, servers, auto control products, mobile devices, mobile phones, and portable consumer products; and optical devices for O/E, Internet, and network communication applications. It also provides voice processing devices for use in PC, NB, servers, O/E products, gateways, network communication products, and modems; and protection devices for use in O/E products, gateways, network communication products, and modems. In addition, the company offers self-developed products for ASIC, DAA, SLIC modules, pair gains, switch routers, power management devices, memory products, display drivers, and AIS applications, as well as time-to-market and value-added services. Alltek Technology Corporation was founded in 1991 and is based in Taipei, Taiwan.

3419.TW.summary: Wha Yu Industrial Co., Ltd. provides antenna products for wireless transmission industry primarily in Taiwan and Hong Kong. It offers telecommunication BTS, in building coverage optimization, outdoor coverage optimization, GPS, automotive, Wi-Fi, LTE, DSRC, walkie talkie, various embedded, military, maritime, and telematics antennas, as well as NFC antennas/modules, alarm devices, RFID products, and electronic cable assemblies. The company was founded in 1981 and is headquartered in Hsinchu City, Taiwan.

3596.TW.summary: Arcadyan Technology Corporation, together with its subsidiaries, engages in the research, development, manufacture, and sale of wireless networking products, integrated access devices, digital home multimedia devices, and mobile broadband products worldwide. It operates in Networking Product and Digital Set-Top Box Product segments. The company provides various broadband access and digital home solutions, such as DSL CPEs, 802.11a/b/g/n client solutions, Wi-Fi modules, FTTx solutions, mobile broadband products, IP set-top boxes, power line communication products, etc. It also offers broadband/wireless/multimedia products for specialized design-in requirements, as well as add-on products to enhance products with wireless convenience. The company provides its solutions to telecom operators, ISPs, retailers, consumer electronic companies, and OEMs/ODMs. Arcadyan Technology Corporation was founded in 2003 and is headquartered in Hsinchu City, Taiwan.

3681.T.summary: V-cube, Inc. develops and provides visual communication services to enterprise customers. The company offers V-CUBE Meeting, a Web conferencing system; and V-CUBE Seminar, a service on cloud-based platform for live Webinar Webcasts and video on demand content delivery. It also provides V-CUBE Gate, a free text chat service; V-CUBE Voice, a teleconferencing service; V-CUBE Presenter for combining the personage of the presenter, slides, and CG effects to add sway to pitches; and V-CUBE One, a collection of visual communication services. V-cube, Inc. was founded in 1998 and is headquartered in Tokyo, Japan.

3694.TW.summary: AzureWave Technologies, Inc. manufactures and sells wireless connectivity and image processing solutions worldwide. The company offers wireless modules, including M.2 socket type, M.2 solder own, solder down stamp, wireless IOT module, and system in package products. It also provides camera modules, such as USB interface, MIPI interface, ultra slim and narrow NB, ultra slim and narrow MIPI, and biological identification/depth detection camera modules. In addition, the company offers design, manufacturing, and software services. Its products have applications in personal and industrial computers, mobile and Internet devices, consumer electronics, home appliances, automotive components, manufacturing facilities, and others. The company was founded in 2005 and is headquartered in New Taipei City, Taiwan.

3704.TW.summary: Unizyx Holding Corporation, through its subsidiaries, provides networking solutions for telecom operators, corporates, and home users worldwide. It offers consumer devices, remote central office equipment, wired and wireless equipment, and home and cloud equipment under the Zyxel brand and MitraStar names. The company was founded in 1989 and is based in Hsinchu, Taiwan.

3TG.F.summary: Trigiant Group Limited, an investment holding company, manufactures and sells feeder cables, optical fiber cables and related products, flame-retardant flexible cables, electronic components, and others for mobile communications and telecommunication equipment in the People's Republic of China. The company's Feeder Cable Series segment offers cables used in transmitting and receiving radio signals, as well as components for telecommunications transmission equipment; and leaky cables primarily used for wireless mobile communications, remote control, and alarm systems for transmitting radio frequency signals, as well as sending and receiving antenna data for areas of weak signal coverage, such as subways, tunnels, underground passages, and interior of buildings. Its Optical Fibre Cable Series and Related Products segment provides cables for use in long haul telecommunication transmission in fixed and wireless telecommunications networks. The company's Flame-Retardant Flexible Cable Series segment offers cables that are used as internal connection cables for power systems or mobile cable transmission, distribution systems, and communications switch systems requiring uninterrupted power. Its New-Type Electronic Components segment provides sensing products; optical splitters; jumpers for connection of wireless antennas with feeder cables and various communications equipment; and connectors for connection of radio frequency circuits to radio equipment and electronic devices, and antenna lightning arresters installed between a high frequency device and a feeder cable. The company's Others segment provides couplers, combiners, feeder wall plates, adjustable stands, waterproof clay, insulating tape, cable ties, and feeder hoisting grips. It exports its products to Brazil, India, Russia, the Middle East, South East Asia, etc. The company was founded in 2007 and is headquartered in Yixing, the People's Republic of China.

4441.T.summary: Tobila Systems Inc. develops and provides fraud filtering systems in Japan. The company offers prank call filter services for mobile and business phones, as well as nuisance call filter services for landlines. It also provides other services, which include netcomfy, a content blocker application for iPhone; phone number.com, an online phonebook; and HP4U, a homepage production service that include coverage, photography, and production. The company was founded in 2004 and is headquartered in Nagoya, Japan.

4906.TW.summary: Gemtek Technology Co., Ltd. designs, develops, manufactures, and sells wireless communications technologies and solutions in Taiwan and internationally. It offers wireless broadband products, including LTE portable routing products, indoor and outdoor routers, and micro base stations for individuals and families, as well as enterprises, factories, and other applications; and fixed broadband products, such as PON, xDSL/G.fast broadband, and DPU broadband hybrid fiber/copper wire distribution point unit products. The company also provides connected smart home products comprising full coverage seamless connection systems, ViTA smart controllers, and smart sensors; LoRa Internet of Things technologies and communication protocols; and joint design and manufacturing, as well as contract manufacturing services. In addition, it offers intelligent wireless system and vertical integration, smart vertical integration, LTE micro base station, and Internet of Things connection protocol solutions. The company was founded in 1988 and is headquartered in Hsinchu, Taiwan.

5388.TW.summary: Sercomm Corporation researches, develops, manufactures, and sells networking communication software and equipment worldwide. The company offers LTE/5G mobility solutions, including small cells, CBRS, private LTE, NB-IoT/LTE-M modules, and LTE/5G terminals; broadband access solutions, such as DOCSIS, FTTx, xDSL, broadband routers, and residential LTE/5G gateways; and IoT (Internet of Things) solutions comprising IP cameras, IoT gateways, mobile IoT devices, low power IoT sensors, and IoT cloud. It also provides enterprise equipment that include WiFi access points, business routers, switches, and IP phones; and home connectivity and entertainment products that include WiFi mesh repeaters, G.hn adapters, over-the-top set-top boxes, and smart speakers. In addition, the company offers consultation and customer services for computer information products; and sells IT products, communication products, and software. Further, it manufactures, servers, routers, OS, and related software. The company was founded in 1992 and is headquartered in Taipei, Taiwan.

5817.T.summary: JMACS Japan Co., Ltd. manufactures and sells instrumentation cables, control cables, communication cables, disaster prevention cables, optical fiber cables, performance cables, and processed harness products in Japan. It also offers smart system solutions, smart security systems, display systems for FA lines, software and hardware systems, industrial products, and lighting products. The company was formerly known as Nihon Electric Wire & Cable Co., Ltd. and changed its name to JMACS Japan Co., Ltd. in September 2015. JMACS Japan Co., Ltd. was founded in 1965 and is headquartered in Osaka, Japan.

5AB.SI.summary: Trek 2000 International Ltd, an investment holding company, engages in the research, design, development, and dealing of computer hardware, software, electronic components, and other related products. The company operates through Interactive Customised Solutions, Interactive Consumer Solutions, and Licensing segments. It offers patented technology solutions, including USB, wireless, anti-piracy, compression, security/encryption, centralized management system, and PC and mobile apps products; and portable storage solutions, such as flash memory. The company also provides wireless solutions, including patient alert systems, Flucard, Flucard ultra, Ai-ball, smart gateway, and smart sensor for diapers; and ThumbDrive solutions, such as trek's smart meters, micro solid state devices, i solid state devices, ThumbDrive cloud, thumbdrive crypto, thumbdrive swipe, ThumbDrive SWAN, and chez solutions to protect crucial information, as well as secure transaction, identity, key, encryption, and storage flash drives. In addition, it is involved in the research and experimental development on medical technologies; research, design, development, and distribution of memory modules, and other related products and solutions; and development and marketing of Web portal services, including social networking sites. Further, the company provides design solutions, such as complete design-in modules or sub-modules in semi-customized or customized forms for software, hardware, and firmware; and security solutions for mobile storage devices, as well as licenses its patented technologies and trademarks. It operates in China/Hong Kong, Taiwan, India, Singapore, Indonesia, Malaysia, Thailand, Europe, the United States, and internationally. Trek 2000 International Ltd was incorporated in 1999 and is headquartered in Singapore.

5BT.F.summary: Baylin Technologies Inc., together with its subsidiaries, researches, designs, develops, manufactures, and sells a range of passive and active radio frequency (RF) and terrestrial microwave products and services. The company offers embedded antennas for use in handsets, tablets, and other mobile devices; device-specific antenna designs for Wi-Fi routers; gateway devices for smart home connectivity, set-top boxes, and land mobile radio products; and indoor and outdoor distributed antenna systems (DAS), and small cell system antennas. It offers its products under the Galtronics, Advantech Wireless, Alga Microwave, and Mitec brands. The company serves the mobile, embedded, DAS, base station antenna, and small cell markets. It operates in the United States, Vietnam, China, South Korea, Singapore, Sweden, the United Kingdom, Canada, Taiwan, Russia, India, and internationally. The company was founded in 1978 and is headquartered in Markham, Canada.

5BT.SG.summary: Baylin Technologies Inc., together with its subsidiaries, researches, designs, develops, manufactures, and sells a range of passive and active radio frequency (RF) and terrestrial microwave products and services. The company offers embedded antennas for use in handsets, tablets, and other mobile devices; device-specific antenna designs for Wi-Fi routers; gateway devices for smart home connectivity, set-top boxes, and land mobile radio products; and indoor and outdoor distributed antenna systems (DAS), and small cell system antennas. It offers its products under the Galtronics, Advantech Wireless, Alga Microwave, and Mitec brands. The company serves the mobile, embedded, DAS, base station antenna, and small cell markets. It operates in the United States, Vietnam, China, South Korea, Singapore, Sweden, the United Kingdom, Canada, Taiwan, Russia, India, and internationally. The company was founded in 1978 and is headquartered in Markham, Canada.

5PU.SG.summary: Putian Communication Group Limited, an investment holding company, produces and sells optical fiber cables, communication copper cables, and structured cabling system products under the Hanphy brand name in Mainland China. The company offers its optical fiber cables and communication copper cables to telecommunications network operators for network construction and maintenance applications. Its structured cabling system products include optical and copper jumper wires; and connection and distribution components, such as distribution frames, wiring closets, and data and audio modules and faceplates used in buildings for the information transmission. The company was founded in 2001 and is based in Nanchang, the People's Republic of China.

5TK.F.summary: AgJunction Inc. provides guidance and autosteering solutions for precision agriculture applications worldwide. Its products and solutions offer accurate guidance and positioning, autosteering, and machine automation for the agriculture markets and used in various farming operation, including tilling, planting, spraying, and harvesting. The company offers RANGER guidance solution, a GPS guidance solution, which shows visual cues in advance affording farmers the time to focus on farming instead of focusing on a map display; and Wheelman autosteering systems, such as Wheelman Pro and Wheelman Flex, and Whirl software for farmers to steer farm equipment directly to farmers through online. It also provides Wheelman white-label solutions; ECU-S1 hardware controller family; and MDU-G4 and MDU-G5 electronic steering, as well as software modules for integration into manufacturer and supplier systems. The company markets its solutions under the Novariant, Wheelman, Whirl, and Handsfreefarm brands. The company was formerly known as Hemisphere GPS Inc. and changed its name to AgJunction Inc. in May 2013. AgJunction Inc. was incorporated in 1990 and is headquartered in Scottsdale, Arizona.

5TL.F.summary: Cogelec SA manufactures intercoms and access control solutions for residential apartment buildings and single-family dwellings. Its serves collective housing, such as social or private, parking, etc.; individual housing; tertiary sector; and local authorities under the Intratone, Hexact, Kibolt, and Filies Armine brands. The company offers its products in 12 countries in Europe. Cogelec SA was founded in 2000 and is based in Mortagne-sur-SÃ¨vre, France.

600105.SS.summary: Jiangsu Etern Company Limited operates in communication cable industry. It offers optical, data, coaxial, and city cables; optical fibers; wires; optical devices; and communication devices and equipment, as well as communication large data and engineering services and system integration solutions. The company also provides data business support platform and after sales services. Jiangsu Etern Company Limited was founded in 1994 and is based in Suzhou, China.

600198.SS.summary: Datang Telecom Technology Co., Ltd. operates in the integrated circuit (IC) design, software and services, terminal design, and mobile Internet sectors in China. The company offers products and services in the areas of IC design, including intelligent terminal, smart security, and automotive electronic chips; terminal design, smartphone, data terminal, and industry terminal services; and smart cards, car networking, sensor networks, and video surveillance products. The company also offers software and services consisting of telecom operation support systems, information security solutions, and platform products; communication devices for wired and wireless access, and optical communication products; and energy saving products. In addition, it provides security chip and mobile terminal solutions for IC design; wireless access and BOSS solutions for operators; smart city and traffic solutions; and smart business center and wisdom tourism products, as well as traffic, agriculture, water, education, energy, and multi-service convergence scheduling platform for industrial applications, and mobile Internet and government information solutions for public services. The company was incorporated in 1998 and is headquartered in Beijing, China.

600260.SS.summary: Kaile Science and Technology Co;Ltd.Hubei operates in the communications industry in China. The company offers civil and military products, including optical fibers, optical cables, data cables, quantum communication data link products, and intelligence terminal products; electrical cables; and pipe, profiles, and geosynthetic products. It also operates autonomous controllable computing platforms; intelligent accusation terminals; and other civilian and military products, as well as communication silicon tubes, smart phones, wearable products, security positioning equipment, medical information platform, radar, non-standard military products, etc. In addition, the company offers Internet products, including Internet + medical, Internet + Network security, Internet + finance, Internet + real estate marketing, and others. Further, it operates as a service provider for software and hardware manufacturing of high-end communication equipment in the informatization industry; and three industrial parks with a gross floor area of approximately 1,800 mu. The company was founded in 1982 and is headquartered in Jingzhou, China.

600345.SS.long_name: WuHan Yangtze Communication Industry Group Co.,Ltd
600345.SS.summary: WuHan Yangtze Communication Industry Group Co.,Ltd engages in the investment, research and development, manufacture, and sale of communications products in China. The company offers optical transmission equipment, access network equipment, optical fibers and cables, wireless communications systems and equipment, base station radiofrequency cables, digital video equipment, communication equipment, precise structure products, and optical memory products, as well as relevant software. It is also involved in the integration of communications and information systems; and provision of technical services. WuHan Yangtze Communication Industry Group Co.,Ltd was founded in 1996 and is based in Wuhan, China.

600355.SS.summary: Routon Electronic Co., Ltd. engages in the research and development, manufacture, sale, and service of electronic terminals in China. The company offers GPS navigation devices, public payphones, e-transaction systems, and public communication terminals. It also operates in South Eastern Asia, the Middle East, Africa, Europe, and South America. The company was founded in 1994 and is headquartered in Wuhan, the People's Republic of China.

600487.SS.summary: Hengtong Optic-Electric Co., Ltd. operates in fiber optic communications industry in China and internationally. It offers fiber optic network, quantum security communication, and ocean observation network products; power transmission products; smart ocean system solutions; rail transit solutions; smart city solutions; and big data systems. The company was founded in 1993 and is based in Suzhou, China.

600498.SS.summary: Fiberhome Telecommunication Technologies Co., Ltd. provides information and communication network products and solutions in China. The company offers carrier solutions, such as optical network, broadband access, carrier IP, boss, IPTV+OTT, broadband CPE, IT infrastructure, ODN, optical fiber and cable, submarine network system, overhead line, copper cable, and SDN/NFV. It also provides cloud computing, big data, modular data center, server/storage, switch/router, overhead line, access, video surveillance, application software, and mobility products. In addition, the company offers network deployment, consulting, service quality, network support, interactive network, knowledge transfer, management, and information integration services. It serves smart city, transportation, government, public safety, post, education, finance, cloud access, cloud video surveillance, and IDC sectors. The company was founded in 1974 and is based in Wuhan, China.

600745.SS.summary: Wingtech Technology Co.,Ltd engages in the research, development, and manufacture of artificial intelligence, IoT, smart phone, notebook, intelligent hardware, laptop, automotive electronic, and other intelligent hardware products worldwide. The company develops and produces mobile phones, tablets, and other intelligent terminals. It also provides virtual reality (VR)/AR machine manufacturing services, including hardware platform development, optical design and structural design, low level software development and system optimization, VR automatic production, and other services. In addition, the company offers a 4G/5G intelligent terminals research and development platform; and engages in the real estate business. The company was formerly known as Join-In (Holding) Co.,Ltd. Wingtech Technology Co.,Ltd is based in Jiaxing, China.

600775.SS.summary: Nanjing Panda Electronics Company Limited, together with its subsidiaries, engages in the development, manufacture, and sale of electronic equipment, electronic computer fitting, office machinery, and tooling products in the People's Republic of China. The company operates through Smart City Industry, Electronic Manufacturing Service, Intelligent Manufacturing Industry, and Others segments. It offers radio communication equipment, radio and television equipment, hardware and electrical equipment, electronic components, instrument and apparatus, electrical machinery, standard machinery, medical equipment products. The company manufactures and sells automatic transmission equipment and industrial robots; railway transit auto fare collection and ACC system equipment, building intellectualization products, and system integration; and mobile communications, digital communications, and network communication systems and products. It also manufactures general purpose equipment, communications equipment, and digital products, as well as provides software development, property management, and catering services. The company was founded in 1936 and is based in Nanjing, the People's Republic of China.

601138.SS.summary: Foxconn Industrial Internet Co., Ltd. engages in the research and development, design, manufacturing, and sale of communication network equipment, cloud service equipment, precision tools, and industrial robots. Its communication network equipment products include network equipment, such as network switches, routers, wireless devices, network servers, set-top boxes, smart home gateways; telecommunication equipment comprising mobile base stations, optical transmission equipment; and high-precision communication network equipment, as well as offers machine components consisting of smart phone high-precision metal and polymer machine components, network telecommunication equipment, high-precision machine components. The company also provides cloud computing products, including tower servers, rack servers, blade servers; storage devices and servers; and storage cabinets. In addition, the company offers precision tools solution, including diamond cutters, tungsten carbide cutters, and micro thread forming taps, as well as offers tool development, production systems, blade design, mass production, precision coating, and application testing. Its products are used in smart phones, broadband and wireless networks, infrastructure construction of multimedia service operators and telecom operators, terminal products required by Internet value-added service providers, infrastructure of enterprise networks and data centers, precision core components, automated intelligent manufacturing, etc. The company is based in Shenzhen, China. Foxconn Industrial Internet Co., Ltd. is a subsidiary of Hon Hai Precision Industry Co., Ltd.

601869.SS.long_name: Yangtze Optical Fibre And Cable Joint Stock Limited Company
601869.SS.summary: Yangtze Optical Fibre And Cable Joint Stock Limited Company manufactures and sells optical fiber and cable products in the People's Republic of China and internationally. The company operates in two segments, Optical Fibres and Optical Fibre Preforms, and Optical Fibre Cables segments. It offers communication optical fibers, cable products, specialty fibers, integrated cabling products, optical distribution frames, optical transceivers, coaxial cables, and cable manufacturing equipment. The company also provides copper wire and related products; integrated wiring systems; germanium tetrachlorides for optical fibers; technical development consulting services for computer hardware and software and ancillary equipment; and vapor and chemical raw materials. In addition, it offers solutions to telecom operators, cloud and data centers, smart campus, railway transportation, education, power grids, and consumer electronics, as well as the government. Further, the company imports, exports, and sells submarine cables, optical cables, and other power cables and their accessories, as well as trades in raw materials; and installs cables, accessories, and systems related to various submarine projects. Additionally, it provides general contracting engineering; equity investment and related management consulting; optical communication research and promotion; and medical materials research services, as well as integrated services in communication, computer, intelligent building, weak current system, and software development. Yangtze Optical Fibre And Cable Joint Stock Limited Company was founded in 1988 and is headquartered in Wuhan, the People's Republic of China.

603042.SS.summary: Nanjing Huamai Technology Co., Ltd. engages in the research and development, design, manufacture, and sale of telecom distribution products and passive microwave products in China. The company offers fiber optic cables, FTTH solutions, MDAS systems, MDAS systems, smart home solutions, data center solutions, and other products. In addition, Nanjing Huamai Technology Co., Ltd. exports its products to approximately 50 countries and regions. The company was founded in 1998 and is based in Nanjing, China.

603118.SS.summary: Shenzhen Gongjin Electronics Co., Ltd. engages in the research and development, manufacture, and sale of wideband communication terminal products in China and internationally. It offers PON access, 3G, and LTE terminal products; EOC access and other products; and wireless products, including enterprise Wi-Fi, SOHO router, Wi-Fi adapter, and 802.11ac products, as well as PLC, wired broadband, IP camera, power supply, and transceiver products. The company was founded in 1998 and is based in Shenzhen, China.

603236.SS.summary: Quectel Wireless Solutions Co., Ltd engages in the research, manufacture, and supply of industrial-grade cellular and Global Navigation Satellite System (GNSS) modules worldwide. The company offers 4G, 3G, 2G, automotive, smart, LPWA (Low Power Wide Area), GNSS IoT modules, as well as short range modules and EVB kits, including LTE, LTE-A, LPWA, UMTS/HSPA(+), GSM/GPRS, and GNSS modules; and technical support services. Its wireless modules are used in telematics and transport, energy, payment, security, smart city, gateway, industrial IoT, life and healthcare, and agriculture and environment industries. The company offers its products through distributors. Quectel Wireless Solutions Co., Ltd was founded in 2010 and is based in Shanghai, China.

603496.SS.summary: EmbedWay Technologies (Shanghai) Corporation provides intelligent system solutions for network visibility infrastructure, and embedded and converged computing platforms in China. The company offers network visibility infrastructure, and embedded and converged computing products. Its products are used in information security, wireless network, communication device manufacturing, telecommunication, network and signaling monitoring, and video processing, as well as value-added services. EmbedWay Technologies (Shanghai) Corporation was founded in 2003 and is headquartered in Shanghai, China.

603660.SS.summary: Suzhou Keda Technology Co., Ltd provides video surveillance and conference products and solutions to public and corporate customers in China. The company's video surveillance products include intelligent cameras, human recognitive cameras, and recognitive tracking systems; commercial and professional network video recorders; network cameras comprising box, IR bullet, semi dome, fisheye, speed dome, explosion proof, and PTZ cameras; video management systems; and vehicle and portable mobile surveillance solutions. Its video surveillance products also consist of encoders and decoders; keyboards; gateways and streaming media servers; network storage products, such as IP SANs and private cloud storage systems; and LED and LCD displays, and splicing processors. The company's video conference products include multipoint control units and media stream servers; meeting room and software endpoints; and peripheral devices, which consist of cameras and microphones. In addition, it offers video application solutions, including emergency dispatch system, remote compliant reception, remote prison visit, distance learning, surgical operation demo system, digital court, and remote video interrogation solutions. The company was founded in 1995 and is headquartered in Suzhou, China.

603803.SS.summary: RAISECOM TECHNOLOGY CO.,Ltd. researches, develops, manufactures, supports, and markets network devices and access solutions worldwide. The company offers carrier Ethernet switches and demarcation devices; SME routers; GPON/EPON products; industrial switches and 3G/4G routers; IP MPLS systems; optical and packet transport network platforms; multi-service chassis and terminal mux products; SDH ADM devices, fiber optical modems, fiber optical transmission devices, multi-service fiber mux products, and multi-service modem and single/double-slot chassis products; and network management systems. It also provides Ethernet over fiber products, Ethernet over PDH products, and Ethernet media converters. In addition, the company offers solutions for access scenarios focusing on service providers, mobile backhaul and front haul, broadband access, mission critical networks, and enterprise and government communications services. RAISECOM TECHNOLOGY CO.,Ltd. was founded in 1999 and is headquartered in Beijing, China.

6142.TW.summary: Cameo Communications, Inc. manufactures and assembles computer network communication equipment and communication products. The company offers layer 2 management Ethernet switches, broadband, wireless client adapters, wireless LAN AP/routers, SOHO routers, Ethernet switches, media converters, USB to Ethernet converters, Web-smart switches and Ethernet NIC products, network cards and hubs, network routers, and network residential gateway products. Its products also comprise consumer and SME/enterprise Wi-Fi products; unmanaged, PoE, Web-smart managed, and bare metal switches; and cable and xDSL modem products. The company markets its products for network integrators, distributors, VARs, and other resellers in the United States, the Pacific Rim, and Europe. Cameo Communications, Inc. was founded in 1991 and is headquartered in Taipei City, Taiwan.

6168.HK.long_name: China U-Ton Future Space Industrial Group Holdings Ltd.
6168.HK.summary: China U-Ton Future Space Industrial Group Holdings Ltd., an investment holding company, engages in the provision of design, deployment, and maintenance services of optical fibers primarily in the People's Republic of China. It operates through Optical Fibers, Communication Networks, Money Lending, and Environmentally Intelligent Technical Products and Services segments. The company's optical fiber deployment solutions include micro-ducts and mini-cables system integration methods, as well as traditional deployment methods comprising direct burial, aerial access, conduit installation, and pipe jacking. It also provides maintenance and repair services to fiber optic networks for telcos; and sells ancillary products, such as micro-ducts and anti-corrosive steel wires to distributors and telecommunication operators. In addition, the company engages in the environmental surveillance and data analysis, environmental early warning and emergency command system construction, and environmental management projects; design, construction, and maintenance of communication networks; and provision of money lending services. The company was formerly known as China U-Ton Holdings Limited and changed its name to China U-Ton Future Space Industrial Group Holdings Ltd. in 2020. China U-Ton Future Space Industrial Group Holdings Ltd. is headquartered in Shijiazhuang, the People's Republic of China.

6216.TW.summary: DrayTek Corporation provides networking equipment and management systems in Taiwan. The company offers router products, such as VPN, broadband, xDSL, LTE, load-balancing, DSL modem, and fiber routers, as well as router matrix; access points; managed switches; management tools; and accessories comprising direct attach passive cooper cables, rack mount brackets, USB thermometers, wireless adapters, and antenna. DrayTek Corporation was founded in 1997 and is headquartered in Hsinchu City, Taiwan.

6285.TW.summary: Wistron NeWeb Corporation researches and develops, manufactures, and sells satellite communication systems and mobile and portable communication equipment in the Americas, Europe, and Asia. The company offers wired communication equipment, wireless communication networking equipment, electronic components, regulated telecommunication radio frequency equipment, satellite communication systems, and mobile and portable communication equipment. It provides satellite communications products, such as DTH TV dish antenna systems, single cable multi-output outdoor receiver systems and derivative products, satellite digital signal convertors, digital satellite radio receiver systems, digital HD radio receiver systems, satellite communications transmitters, 4K/8K high-definition digital satellite radio receivers, and high-frequency satellite two-way communications receivers. The company also offers mobile and home communications products, including wireless broadband access network communications equipment and modules, mobile indoor and outdoor broadband network terminal devices, embedded antennas for mobile devices, fiber-optic connectivity devices, surveillance cameras, V2X communication end devices, automotive cellular 4G/Wi-Fi/BT modules, Wi-Fi mesh routers, BLE modules and sensors, high-speed data center network switches, mobile broadband home gateways, and smart home devices with voice assistant. In addition, it provides other wireless products comprising high-frequency forward collision warning automotive radar devices, automotive cameras, mmWave transmission modules, industrial cellular modem, IoT asset-tracking devices, and RFID readers/antenna product series. Wistron NeWeb Corporation was founded in 1996 and is headquartered in Hsinchu, Taiwan.

6416.TW.summary: CASwell Inc. engages in the design, engineering, manufacture, and sale of network computing and quality-proved platforms to system integrators, solution providers, and service providers worldwide. It offers network security and management products, such as 2U, 1U, fanless, desktop, and other core appliances; cloud computing and data center products, including data center switches and cloud storage servers; network attached storage products for large business, SMB, SOHO/home, and windows applications; and industrial control and automation products comprising industrial firewall, network, and control systems. The company also provides edge/fog computing products, such as SD-WAN/uCPE/vCPE products, SDN switches, and NFV servers; proprietary, proprietary PoE, network, and POE network adapters; and proprietary acceleration, storage proprietary, and network acceleration modules. CASwell Inc. was founded in 2007 and is headquartered in New Taipei City, Taiwan.

6634.T.summary: NCXX Group Inc. engages in the development, sale, maintenance, and other services of communication equipment centered on mobile Internet devices and M2M modules. It also provides IoT solutions; Internet travel services; and nursing care services, as well as develops and sells nursing care robots and nursing care ICT systems. In addition, the company is involved in planning, developing, and selling agricultural ICT, as well as plans, manufactures, and sells original ethnic clothing and miscellaneous goods; and provides consulting, design, construction, system development operation and maintenance, network, database, and other infrastructure construction services in manufacturing, finance, distribution, and social public industries. NCXX Group Inc. was founded in 1984 and is headquartered in Hanamaki, Japan.

6675.T.summary: SAXA Holdings, Inc., through its subsidiaries, engages in the development, manufacture, and sale of information communication system equipment and components in Japan. The company was founded in 2004 and is headquartered in Tokyo, Japan.

6703.T.summary: Oki Electric Industry Co., Ltd. manufactures and sells products, technologies, software, and solutions for telecommunication and information systems in Japan and internationally. It operates through four segments: ICT, Mechatronics Systems, Printers, and EMS. The company offers transportation infrastructure systems, disaster prevention related systems, defense related systems, communication equipment for telecommunication carriers, financial branch office systems, administrative centralized systems, reservation ticketing systems, IP-PBX, business phones, contact centers, 920 MHz multi-hop wireless systems, etc., as well as maintenance and construction services. It also provides mechatronics systems, including automated teller machines (ATMs), cash handling machines, bank branch terminals, reservation ticket issuing terminals, check-in terminals, foreign currency exchange machines, ATM monitoring and operations services, etc.; and printers, such as color/monochrome LED printers, color/monochrome LED multifunction printers, large format inkjet printers, dot impact printers, wide format inkjet printers, wide format multi-function printers, LED print heads, etc. In addition, the company offers EMS services, such as consigned design and manufacturing services, printed wiring boards, etc. Further, it provides reliability testing and environmental conservation related services. Oki Electric Industry Co., Ltd. was founded in 1881 and is headquartered in Tokyo, Japan.

6704.T.summary: Iwatsu Electric Co., Ltd. manufactures and sells business communication, printing systems, and test and measurement equipment in Japan and internationally. It offers industrial digital label printing systems and digital platesetters; and test and measurement equipment, including semiconductor curve tracers, B-H analyzers, isolation systems and probes, oscilloscopes, delay pattern generators, digital multimeters, signal generators, and universal counters, as well as coil current probes. Iwatsu Electric Co., Ltd. was founded in 1938 and is headquartered in Tokyo, Japan.

6706.T.summary: DKK Co., Ltd. manufactures and sells telecommunication and radio frequency equipment in Japan and internationally. The company's Telecommunication division offers mobile communication infrastructure systems, including cellular base station and smaller size antennas, products for mobile WiMAX, peripheral devices, and mobile communications towers, as well as provides cellular base station construction and maintenance services; and broadcasting products, such as broadcasting and microwave antennas, medium and short wave antennas, gap fillers, towers, shelters, power supply apparatus, and FPU rotators, as well as provides broadcasting construction and maintenance services. This division also offers data communications products comprising regional WiMAX products, microwave network antennas, and satellite telecommunication products; and energy products consisting of wind towers, mounting structures for solar power panels, and mounting structures for secondary batteries. Its Radio Frequency division provides induction heating equipment, including hardening and tempering equipment, and high frequency generators; RF applied equipment, such as high power RF amplifier systems, and RF power generators for plasma excitation and induction heating; vacuum furnaces; and IH heat-treatment processing products. DKK Co., Ltd. was founded in 1950 and is headquartered in Tokyo, Japan.

6715.T.summary: Nakayo, Inc. manufactures and sells telecommunications equipment in Japan and internationally. The company offers key telephone systems, telephone sets, telephone parts, switching equipment, and data equipment, as well as devices related to environmental, and energy equipment and related products. The company operates through Business Solutions, Consumer Solutions, Network Solutions, and Service & Support divisions. The Business Solutions division offers digital button telephones, IP terminal devices, cordless phones, DSL modems, components, etc. The Consumer Solutions division provides ISDN terminal adapters, alarm devices, PHS modules, cordless phones, and fax machines. The Network Solutions division offers switching systems, PBXs, and transfer equipment. The Service & Support division offers EMS and software development services; and metal dies for presses/molds, etc. The company was formerly known as Nakayo Telecommunications, Inc. and changed its name to Nakayo, Inc. in August 2014. Nakayo, Inc. was founded in 1944 and is based in Maebashi, Japan.

6715.TW.summary: Lintes Technology Co., Ltd. designs, develops, and manufactures consumer electronics and communication connectivity products. The company offers active and passive cables, adaptors, travel docks, and dongles; and active optical cables. It serves original equipment manufacturers and original design manufacturers. Lintes Technology Co., Ltd. is based in New Taipei City, Taiwan.

6718.T.summary: Aiphone Co.,Ltd. manufactures and sells communication and security devices under the AIPHONE brand name for housing, hospitals, nursing facilities, office buildings, and other uses worldwide. It offers general intercom devices for home and business use; security door intercoms and electronic locking systems; video door intercoms; health care intercom devices, such as nurse call and home care systems; and information transmission devices comprising living information display panels. The company was incorporated in 1947 and is headquartered in Nagoya, Japan.

6771.T.summary: Ikegami Tsushinki Co., Ltd. provides broadcast equipment in Japan and internationally. It offers broadcast cameras and monitors; digital FPU microwave products, such as microwave links, millimeter-wave wireless links, and, multichannel fiber transmission products; switchers and routers; medical grade cameras, monitors, and recorders; security cameras, monitors, and DVR; and tablet inspection/printing equipment, powder inspection equipment, plane inspection equipment, and inspection equipment peripherals. The company was formerly known as Ikegami Tsushinki Seisakusho and changed its name to Ikegami Tsushinki Co., Ltd. in 1951. Ikegami Tsushinki Co., Ltd. was founded in 1946 and is headquartered in Tokyo, Japan.

6778.T.summary: Artiza Networks, Inc. provides radio access network and core network node testing products to mobile network operators, network equipment manufacturers, system integrators, and other types of companies in the telecommunications industry. The company offers LTE eNodeB testing products, including Duo SIM-advanced load testers, functional testers, and environmental simulators, as well as DuoSIM-5G and DuoSIM testers; QoE optimization and packet capture tools; and compact Ethernet service testing devices for carrier/metro Ethernet service providers. It also provides functional testing, performance testing, product demonstration, and 5G solutions; and QoE optimization, centralized RAN, carrier aggregation, Internet of Things, and quality assurance solutions. The company was formerly known as Able Communication Inc. and changed its name to Artiza Networks, Inc. in 2001. Artiza Networks, Inc. was founded in 1990 and is headquartered in Tachikawa, Japan.

6820.T.summary: Icom Incorporated, together with its subsidiaries, manufactures and sells telecommunications equipment primarily in Japan, the United States, Canada, Germany, Spain, Australia, Taiwan, and China. The company offers land mobile products, such as digital, conventional and trunked, digital/analog, handheld, mobile, VHF and UHF, VHF and UHF FM, FM, dPMR 446/PMR 446, LTE, wireless LAN, VHF and UHF data, and HF transceivers; repeaters; external controllers; radio over IP gateways, routers, and remote communicator software; and active noise canceling and remote control microphones, automatic tuning antennas, and OTAP and system manager software products. It also provides marine products, including VHF, MF/HF, and HF marine, as well as VHF and HF transceivers; survival craft 2-way radios; radio telephones; remote-control microphones; MarineCommander, a marine navigation system, which integrates various marine modules, such as a fish finder, marine radar, and AIS and VHF transceiver into the multi-function displays; marine radars; and transponders. In addition, the company offers aviation products comprising handheld and mobile air band transceivers; and amateur products consisting of digital, dual band FM, FM, dual band digital, dual band, HF, HF all band, HF/VHF/UHF, and HF/VHF/UHF all mode transceivers, as well as IP remote control software, USB remote encoders, applications, active noise canceling microphones, and external speakers. Further, it provides receiver products, including handheld communications receivers, remote control software, and applications. Icom Incorporated was founded in 1954 and is headquartered in Osaka, Japan.

6835.T.summary: Allied Telesis Holdings K.K., a holding company, engages in the planning, development, manufacture, and sale of network devices and solutions worldwide. The company manufactures network products, including hardware and software; and solutions that will expand the possibilities of network infrastructure, such as systems where network infrastructure blocks unauthorized access in collaboration with security software and asset management software, as well as systems where monitoring cameras monitor and detect physical hazards that include acts of terrorism. It also provides support services, which comprise planning and consulting, installation and structuring, operation and monitoring, and education services. The company was incorporated in 1971 and is headquartered in Tokyo, Japan.

6869.HK.long_name: Yangtze Optical Fibre And Cable Joint Stock Limited Company
6869.HK.summary: Yangtze Optical Fibre And Cable Joint Stock Limited Company manufactures and sells optical fiber and cable products in the People's Republic of China and internationally. The company operates in two segments, Optical Fibres and Optical Fibre Preforms, and Optical Fibre Cables segments. It offers communication optical fibers, cable products, specialty fibers, integrated cabling products, optical distribution frames, optical transceivers, coaxial cables, and cable manufacturing equipment. The company also provides copper wire and related products; integrated wiring systems; germanium tetrachlorides for optical fibers; technical development consulting services for computer hardware and software and ancillary equipment; and vapor and chemical raw materials. In addition, it offers solutions to telecom operators, cloud and data centers, smart campus, railway transportation, education, power grids, and consumer electronics, as well as the government. Further, the company imports, exports, and sells submarine cables, optical cables, and other power cables and their accessories, as well as trades in raw materials; and installs cables, accessories, and systems related to various submarine projects. Additionally, it provides general contracting engineering; equity investment and related management consulting; optical communication research and promotion; and medical materials research services, as well as integrated services in communication, computer, intelligent building, weak current system, and software development. Yangtze Optical Fibre And Cable Joint Stock Limited Company was founded in 1988 and is headquartered in Wuhan, the People's Republic of China.

688159.SS.summary: Shenzhen Neoway Technology Co.,Ltd. provides communications products and related services for Industrial Internet of Things primarily in China. Its products include 2G/3G/4G/NB-IoT/eMTC cellular modules, devices, and solutions, which are used in smart energy, IoV, smart manufacturing, commercial retail, smart city, and other industries. It also provides ODM drives, LPWA modules, automotive grade modules, smart modules, and GNSS modules. The company was founded in 2006 and is headquartered in Shenzhen, China.

6904.T.summary: Harada Industry Co., Ltd. plans, designs, develops, manufactures, and sells various automotive antennas for radio broadcasting, GPS, phone, DSRC, ETC, TV, and others. It offers fin, rod, screen, film, and integrated type antennas, as well as other antennas. The company also provides cables, such as copper clad aluminum, coaxial, and shielded twisted pair cables, as well as connectors. In addition, Harada Industry Co., Ltd. offers amplifiers and noise filters. It provides products in Japan, Asia, North and Central America, and Europe. The company was formerly known as Harada Electric Manufacturing Co., Ltd. and changed its name to Harada Industry Co., Ltd. in March 1958. Harada Industry Co., Ltd. was founded in 1947 and is headquartered in Tokyo, Japan.

6930.T.summary: Nippon Antenna Co.,Ltd. manufactures and sells television reception, telecommunications, security, and information network equipment in Japan and internationally. The company offers antennas and receivers for terrestrial digital broadcasting; CATV equipment; satellite receiving systems; satellite communications receivers and various electronic equipment for TV reception; TV, communications, and marine antennas; filter/duplexers; and portable phone/PHS antennas. It also offers Bluetooth speakers and handsets, neck speakers, AC adapter, mobile batteries, MHL cables and adapters, holders for tablet, and NFC tags; and telecommunications engineering services, as well as undertakes construction of systems. Nippon Antenna Co.,Ltd. was founded in 1953 and is headquartered in Tokyo, Japan.

6LV.F.summary: Airgain, Inc. designs, develops, and engineers antenna products for original equipment and design manufacturers, chipset vendors, service providers, and value added resellers and distributors worldwide. The company's products include MaxBeam embedded antennas; profile embedded antennas; profile contour embedded antennas; ultra-embedded antennas; OmniMax high performance external antennas; MaxBeam carrier class antennas; and SmartMax embedded antennas, as well as automotive, fleet, public safety, and M2M antennas. It provides embedded antenna technologies to enable high performance wireless networking across a range of devices and markets, including consumer, enterprise, and automotive. The company was formerly known as AM Group and changed its name to Airgain, Inc. in 2004. Airgain, Inc. was founded in 1995 and is headquartered in San Diego, California.

7673.T.summary: Daiko Tsusan Co.,Ltd. engages in CATV and information/telecommunications trading and consulting activities. The company is involved in trading of items required for the construction of networks, equipment maintenance, and system sophistication; and provision of consulting services for the design of system arrangement and selection of equipment/materials. Daiko Tsusan Co.,Ltd. was incorporated in 1975 and is headquartered in Matsuyama, Japan.

7CV.F.summary: Novra Technologies Inc., together with its subsidiaries, provides products, systems, and services for the distribution of multimedia broadband content in Canada and internationally. The company offers video distribution products and systems for the provision of end-to-end solutions to traditional and non-traditional video networks; end-to-end infrastructure solutions for broadcast radio networks, including uplink and receive site equipment, as well as network management, encryption, and targeted regionalization/ad insertion options; and data distribution for hardware infrastructure, as well as content distribution network software solution for secure file broadcasting. It also provides digital cinema network infrastructure and services, high-end appliances for cinemas, decoders for live events and alternative content in 2D and 3D, and digital cinema distribution software solutions; and DVB and ATSC compliant receivers for the broadband communications network market. The company was founded in 2000 and is headquartered in Winnipeg, Canada.

8043.HK.summary: Atlinks Group Limited, an investment holding company, designs, develops, and sells home and office telecommunication products to retailers, telecommunication operators, and distributors primarily in Europe and Latin America. The company develops and distributes telephones, monitoring solutions, baby monitors, and conferencing phones under the Alcatel brand; and landline phones, smart home accessories, mobile phones, and various services to support and reassure senior users under the Swissvoice brand. It also provides sound telephones, headphones, accessories, and mobile phones under the Amplicomms brand. In addition, the company develops and trades in electrical equipment, including radio communication equipment; and manages trademarks. The company was founded in 2013 and is based in Kowloon Bay, Hong Kong. Atlinks Group Limited is a subsidiary of Eiffel Global Limited.

8101.TW.summary: Arima Communications Corp. researches, develops, designs, manufactures, and sells mobile communication and Internet of Things products primarily in Taiwan. Its solutions include mobile devices; tablets; and LTE wearable trackers, smart rearview mirrors, barcode scanners, and RF modules. The company was founded in 1999 and is based in New Taipei City, Taiwan.

8227.HK.long_name: Xi'an Haitian Antenna Technologies Co., Ltd.
8227.HK.summary: Xi'an Haitian Antenna Technologies Co., Ltd., together with its subsidiaries, researches and develops, manufactures, installs, and sells mobile communication antennas and related products in the People's Republic of China and other Asian countries. The company offers underwater and underground surveillance, imaging, mechanical equipment, and other related products; complicated environment warning and surveillance equipment; and agricultural and forestry used unmanned aerial vehicles, as well as consultancy services. It also trades in construction related products; and poultry and agricultural products.
